references.reason: This paper introduces GANs, a foundational model used extensively in the proposed PPDG-MI method for generating pseudo-private data.

references.paper_title: Model inversion attacks that exploit confidence information and basic countermeasures
references.reason: This is a seminal work on model inversion attacks (MIAs), providing the foundation for the attack methods discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: Mirror: Model inversion for deep learning network with high fidelity
references.reason: This paper is cited for its high-fidelity model inversion approach, which is relevant to the high-resolution attack methods considered in the paper.
This paper is important due to its focus on knowledge-enriched MIAs, a theme that is relevant to the high-resolution attack scenarios explored.

references.paper_title: Plug & play attacks: Towards robust and flexible model inversion attacks
references.reason: This paper proposes a state-of-the-art MIA approach which the current work improves upon by introducing dynamic prior adjustment
